name: CircuitSutra Technologies
overview:
CircuitSutra Technologies Pvt. Limited provides software development services for the semiconductor industry. It offers SystemC based modeling services, such as SystemC based electronic system level design methodology; transaction level modeling (TLM) of IP/SoC at various abstraction levels; virtual platform development services; and TLM testing services. The company also provides CAD services, which include developing customized EDA tools; enhancing, supporting, and testing inhouse EDA tools; developing, enhancing, and maintaining the parameterized cells; enhancing the inhouse tools to support new process nodes or new design methodologies; and OpenAccess based services. In addition, it offers outsourced product development services, such as development, product validation, customer support, configuration management, and documentation. Further, the company provides embedded software product development services. It serves IC/SoC design, embedded product, EDA tool, and process automation companies, as well as networking, telecom, and consumer electronics markets.

The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Noida, India.

funding_rounds.source_description: CircuitSutra raises funding from SIDBI SAS

offices.address2: E3, First Floor, Amity Univ. Campus
